Package de.humatic.jdl

Class Summary
Decklink General access point for a Decklink card in a DSFiltergraph.
DecklinkCaptureBanner IDecklinkCaptureBanner implementation - this interface is exposed by the Decklink Video Capture filter and can be used to write to the "no input" framebuffer, whose contents will be routed to the filter's output when no video signal is present on the card's selected capture input.
DecklinkInterface Baseclass for all Decklink interfaces.
DecklinkIOControl IDecklinkIOControl implementation, this interface is exposed by all Decklink filters.
DecklinkKeyer IDecklinkKeyer implementation - this interface is exposed by the Decklink Video Render filter.
DecklinkRawDeviceControl IDecklinkRawDeviceControl implementation - this interface is exposed by the Decklink Video Render filter and can be used for hardware device control via the card's RS422 connector.
DecklinkStatus IDecklinkStatus implementation - this interface is exposed by the Decklink Video Capture filter.
